select distinct on (i.id) i.id, i."Name" as nameIn, i.description, i.area, i.creation_date, i.modify_date, i.user_id, ts.status as status, kw.word, u.id idus, u.name, u.email, u.Type_user tuser, u.lastname FROM (SELECT ini.* FROM initiative ini, key_words kwo, word_initiative woi where kwo.id=woi.Key_words_id and woi.Initiative_id=ini.id and kwo.word= #{keyword}) as i, Key_words as kw, word_initiative as wi, type_status as ts, "User" as u WHERE kw.id=wi.Key_words_id and wi.Initiative_id=i.id and ts.status = i.type_status_id and i.user_id = u.id ;
